pr_title: Set prism.sw inside the integration projects

timeline.message: Set prism.sw inside the integration projects

timeline.bodyText: We don't really need to hardcode the prism pipeline that we want to use. javafx will automatically fallback to the software pipeline when the hardware pipeline fails to start. And in the unlikely case that hardware support on CI systems becomes available in the future, we'll use it for free.
timeline.author: tiainen
